text: And when the man rose up to depart, he, and his concubine, and his servant, his father in law, the damselâ€™s father, said unto him, Behold, now the day draweth toward evening, I pray you tarry all night: behold, the day groweth to an end, lodge here, that thine heart may be merry; and to morrow get you early on your way, that thou mayest go home.19.9 draweth: Heb. is weak19.9 the day groweth to an end: Heb. it is the pitching time of the day19.9 home: Heb. to thy tent
